text:
remove import { useI18n } from 'vue-i18n'; and use plain text
I'll remove the `import { useI18n } from 'vue-i18n';` line and replace any usage of the i18n functionality with plain text. Please provide the code you want me to modify so I can make these changes for you.
```vue pay/resources/mms/js/Screens/InventoryManagement/Terminals/View/Sections/TerminalDetails/TerminalDetailsCard.vue
<script setup>
import enums from '@/common/Enums/index.js';
import { formatDate } from '@/common/utils/date';
import { statusClass } from '@/common/utils/status';
import { useMapEnumValue } from '@/mms/js/Composables/useMapEnumValue';
import { computed } from 'vue';
const { mapEnumValue } = useMapEnumValue();

const props = defineProps({
    item: {
        type: Object,
        required: true,
    },
});

const terminalStatus = computed(() => {
    return props.item.is_migrated
        ? 'Migrated'
        : mapEnumValue(props.item.status, 'terminalStatuses');
});
</script>

<template>
    <details-card class="mb-8">
        <details-card-item :title="$t('Reference')" :value="item.reference" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Terminal ID (8)')"
            :value="item.terminal_id8" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Terminal ID (16)')"
            :value="item.terminal_id16" />
        <details-card-item :title="$t('TRSM')" :value="item.trsm" />
        <details-card-item :title="$t('Status')" :value="terminalStatus" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Sim Card Provider')"
            :value="mapEnumValue(item.sim_card_provider, 'simCardProviders')" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Sim Card Number')"
            :value="item.sim_card_number" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Installation Request Date')"
            :value="formatDate(item.installation_request_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Installation Date')"
            :value="formatDate(item.installation_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Pullout Request Date')"
            :value="formatDate(item.pullout_request_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Pullout Date')"
            :value="formatDate(item.pullout_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Last Reconciliation Date')"
            :value="
                formatDate(item.last_reconciliation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm a')
            " />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Original TID (8)')"
            :value="item.original_tid8" />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Enabled')"
            :value="item.is_active ? $t('Yes') : $t('No')"
            :slot-value-css-class="
                statusClass(item.is_active, enums.statusColors.active)
            " />
        <details-card-item
            :title="$t('Migrated TID (8)')"
            :value="item.migrated_tid8" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Quote Line Number"
            :value="item.quote_line_number" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Terminal Installation Remark"
            :value="item.terminal_installation_remark" />
    </details-card>
</template>
```

here it is
Here's the modified code with the i18n functionality replaced with plain text:

```vue
<script setup>
import enums from '@/common/Enums/index.js';
import { formatDate } from '@/common/utils/date';
import { statusClass } from '@/common/utils/status';
import { useMapEnumValue } from '@/mms/js/Composables/useMapEnumValue';
import { computed } from 'vue';
const { mapEnumValue } = useMapEnumValue();

const props = defineProps({
    item: {
        type: Object,
        required: true,
    },
});

const terminalStatus = computed(() => {
    return props.item.is_migrated
        ? 'Migrated'
        : mapEnumValue(props.item.status, 'terminalStatuses');
});
</script>

<template>
    <details-card class="mb-8">
        <details-card-item title="Reference" :value="item.reference" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Terminal ID (8)"
            :value="item.terminal_id8" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Terminal ID (16)"
            :value="item.terminal_id16" />
        <details-card-item title="TRSM" :value="item.trsm" />
        <details-card-item title="Status" :value="terminalStatus" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Sim Card Provider"
            :value="mapEnumValue(item.sim_card_provider, 'simCardProviders')" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Sim Card Number"
            :value="item.sim_card_number" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Installation Request Date"
            :value="formatDate(item.installation_request_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Installation Date"
            :value="formatDate(item.installation_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Pullout Request Date"
            :value="formatDate(item.pullout_request_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Pullout Date"
            :value="formatDate(item.pullout_date)" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Last Reconciliation Date"
            :value="
                formatDate(item.last_reconciliation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm a')
            " />
        <details-card-item
            title="Original TID (8)"
            :value="item.original_tid8" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Enabled"
            :value="item.is_active ? 'Yes' : 'No'"
            :slot-value-css-class="
                statusClass(item.is_active, enums.statusColors.active)
            " />
        <details-card-item
            title="Migrated TID (8)"
            :value="item.migrated_tid8" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Quote Line Number"
            :value="item.quote_line_number" />
        <details-card-item
            title="Terminal Installation Remark"
            :value="item.terminal_installation_remark" />
    </details-card>
</template>
```

I've made the following changes:
1. Removed any `$t()` calls and replaced them with plain text strings
2. Changed all title attributes from `:title="$t('SomeText')"` to `title="SomeText"`
3. Changed the Enabled value from `item.is_active ? $t('Yes') : $t('No')` to `item.is_active ? 'Yes' : 'No'`

The functionality should remain the same, but now it uses plain text instead of the i18n translation system.
summary: Vue I18n Replacement With Plain Text
